verses.verse: And God <S%H430><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%>, and all the beasts <S%H2416><s%>, and all the cattle <S%H929><s%> that were with him in the ark <S%H8392><s%>: and God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H5674><s%> a wind <S%H7307><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, and the waters <S%H4325><s%> assuaged <S%H7918><s%>;

the fountains <S%H4599><s%> also of the deep <S%H8415><s%> and the windows <S%H699><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> were stopped <S%H5534><s%>, and the rain <S%H1653><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> was restrained <S%H3607><s%>;

and the waters <S%H4325><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> from off the earth <S%H776><s%> continually <S%H1980><s%>: and after the end <S%H7097><s%> of a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> decreased <S%H2637><s%>.

And the ark <S%H8392><s%> rested <S%H5117><s%> in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, on the seventeenth <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%>, upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Ararat <S%H780><s%>.

And the waters <S%H4325><s%> decreased <S%H2637><s%> continually <S%H1980><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>: in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month <S%H259><s%>, on the first day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, were the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%>.

And it came to pass at the end <S%H7093><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, that Noah <S%H5146><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> the window <S%H2474><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%> which he had made <S%H6213><s%>:

and he sent forth <S%H7971><s%> a raven <S%H6158><s%>, and it went forth <S%H3318><s%> to <S%H3318><s%> and fro <S%H7725><s%>, until the waters <S%H4325><s%> were dried up <S%H3001><s%> from off the earth <S%H776><s%>.
And he sent forth <S%H7971><s%> a dove <S%H3123><s%> from him <S%H7200><s%>, to see if the waters <S%H4325><s%> were abated <S%H7043><s%> from off the face <S%H6440><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%>;

but the dove <S%H3123><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> no rest <S%H4494><s%> for the sole <S%H3709><s%> of her foot <S%H7272><s%>, and she returned <S%H7725><s%> unto him to the ark <S%H8392><s%>; for the waters <S%H4325><s%> were on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the whole earth <S%H776><s%>: and he put forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and took her <S%H3947><s%>, and brought her in <S%H935><s%> unto him into the ark <S%H8392><s%>.
And he stayed <S%H2342><s%> yet other <S%H312><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; and again <S%H3254><s%> he sent forth <S%H7971><s%> the dove <S%H3123><s%> out of the ark <S%H8392><s%>;

and the dove <S%H3123><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> to him at eventide <S%H6256><s%>; and <S%H6310><s%>, lo, in her mouth an <S%H2132><s%> olive-leaf <S%H5929><s%> plucked off <S%H2965><s%>: so Noah <S%H5146><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> that the waters <S%H4325><s%> were abated from off the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And he stayed <S%H3176><s%> yet other <S%H312><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, and sent forth <S%H7971><s%> the dove <S%H3123><s%>; and she returned <S%H7725><s%> not again <S%H3254><s%> unto him any more <S%H5750><s%>.

And it came to pass in the six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and first year <S%H8141><s%>, in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H259><s%>, the first day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, the waters <S%H4325><s%> were dried up <S%H2717><s%> from off the earth <S%H776><s%>: and Noah <S%H5146><s%> removed <S%H5493><s%> the covering <S%H4372><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%>, and looked <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H6440><s%>, behold, the face of the ground <S%H127><s%> was dried <S%H2717><s%>.
And in the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, on the seven <S%H7651><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%>, was the earth <S%H776><s%> dry <S%H3001><s%>.
And God <S%H430><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Noah <S%H5146><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Go forth <S%H3318><s%> from the ark <S%H8392><s%>, thou <S%H802><s%>, and thy wife, and thy sons <S%H1121><s%>, and thy sons <S%H1121><s%>' wives with thee <S%H802><s%>.

Bring forth <S%H3318><s%> with thee every living thing <S%H2416><s%> that is with thee of all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, both birds <S%H5775><s%>, and cattle <S%H929><s%>, and every creeping thing <S%H7431><s%> that creepeth <S%H7430><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>; that they may breed abundantly <S%H8317><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>, and be fruitful <S%H6509><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.
And Noah <S%H5146><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and his wife <S%H802><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>' wives with him <S%H802><s%>:

every beast <S%H2416><s%>, every creeping thing <S%H7431><s%>, and every bird <S%H5775><s%>, whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> moveth <S%H7430><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, went forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the ark <S%H8392><s%>.

And Noah <S%H5146><s%> builded <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> of every clean <S%H2889><s%> beast <S%H929><s%>, and of every clean <S%H2889><s%> bird <S%H5775><s%>, and offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> smelled <S%H7306><s%> the sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%>; and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> in <S%H413><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%>, I will not again <S%H3254><s%> curse <S%H7043><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%> any more for man <S%H120><s%>'s sake <S%H5668><s%>, for that the imagination <S%H3336><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%> is evil <S%H7451><s%> from his youth <S%H5271><s%>; neither will I again <S%H3254><s%> smite <S%H5221><s%> any more everything living <S%H2416><s%>, as I have done <S%H6213><s%>.

While the earth <S%H776><s%> remaineth <S%H3117><s%>, seedtime <S%H2233><s%> and harvest <S%H7105><s%>, and cold <S%H7120><s%> and heat <S%H2527><s%>, and summer <S%H7019><s%> and winter <S%H2779><s%>, and day <S%H3117><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> shall not cease <S%H7673><s%>.
